headline: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) Declares US$3.30 Q2 Dividend for 2025
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) has recently announced a second-quarter 2025 dividend of $3.30 per share, adding positive momentum to its shares, which saw a 7% increase over the last quarter. During this period, the company also reported strong Q1 earnings, with revenue and net income outperforming the previous year. Alongside the dividend, an active share buyback program likely supported its share price. These factors collectively complemented broader market trends, which have risen by 8% over...
